title: Free Outdoor Movies: Ride Above (Tempête)
description: Free outdoor movie screening of 'Ride Above (Tempête)' at Riverside Park's 116th Street overlook (Morningside Heights).
address: Riverside Park's 116th Street overlook, Morningside Heights

title: Free Outdoor Movies: Selena
description: Free outdoor movie screening of 'Selena' at Sunset Park (Brooklyn).

title: Free Outdoor Movies: The Great Gatsby (1974)
description: Free outdoor movie screening of 'The Great Gatsby (1974)' at Madison Square Park (Flatiron).

title: Morningside Lights Lantern-Building Workshops
description: Registration opens for Morningside Lights lantern-building workshops to help make unique giant lanterns for the 13th annual Morningside Lights procession.

title: Gather Round: Street and Club Dance Battles
description: Street and club dance battles at Manhattan West Plaza featuring four breakdancing teams, DJ KS360, and DJ DP One. Free admission.

title: Domino Park Presents: Salsa by the Water
description: Free salsa dancing event at Domino Park with an intro salsa class at 6:15 pm, DJs, and a live band.

title: Awkward Teenage Years
description: Storytelling event featuring storytellers reliving their joys and traumas, hosted by Will Clegg. Sliding scale admission.

title: That Jenny C'est Quoi
description: Stand-up comedy show by Jenny Gorelick, hosted by drag queen Virgo Rising.

title: Doctors Without Boundaries
description: Comedy show featuring real-life ER doctors and standups sharing stories about their weirdest diagnoses.
